body: I'm new here, so I have no clue how to do a lot of things. Currently, the only way I know how to post images is via imgur. I'm seeing other people post images that you can open in the Ruqqus site. How do I do this?
body_html: I'm new here, so I have no clue how to do a lot of things. Currently, the only way I know how to post images is via imgur. I'm seeing other people post images that you can open in the Ruqqus site. How do I do this?

title: Question: How to post images that don't require you to go to imgur?

author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.
author.bio_html:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body:
As others have already said, you have to have 1,000 rep to upload images directly to ruqqus. However, in the meantime there are plenty of other whitelisted image domains:

![](https://i.ruqqus.com/post/rh2/J8AxMxvOYKI)

This is as of the end of June, even more have been added since then.

If you want to get 1k rep just shitpost a couple times, it's not hard here because of the low competition.
body_html:
As others have already said, you have to have 1,000 rep to upload images directly to ruqqus. However, in the meantime there are plenty of other whitelisted image domains:

This is as of the end of June, even more have been added since then.

If you want to get 1k rep just shitpost a couple times, it's not hard here because of the low competition.

post.body: I'm new here, so I have no clue how to do a lot of things. Currently, the only way I know how to post images is via imgur. I'm seeing other people post images that you can open in the Ruqqus site. How do I do this?
post.body_html: I'm new here, so I have no clue how to do a lot of things. Currently, the only way I know how to post images is via imgur. I'm seeing other people post images that you can open in the Ruqqus site. How do I do this?
post.title: Question: How to post images that don't require you to go to imgur?

body:
If you referring to actual post image, not the Markdown within the post body, according comments within [this](https://ruqqus.com/post/18a1/-guys-please-link-directly-to) post, you need to use  i.imgur.com/file.png links, not imgur.com ones, which is achieved by doing the `Right-Click -> Copy image address` on an Imgur picture.

I have not tested this personally, but I have seen it mentioned multiple times by a variety of people.
body_html:
If you referring to actual post image, not the Markdown within the post body, according comments within this post, you need to use i.imgur.com/file.png links, not imgur.com ones, which is achieved by doing the Right-Click -> Copy image address on an Imgur picture.

I have not tested this personally, but I have seen it mentioned multiple times by a variety of people.
